long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edit any recipe on the web to your diet and lifestyle preferences with the power of AI! FoodWiz is the easiest way to fine-tune any recipe to your exact specifications.

Need to double the recipe size? No problemüç≤
Need to make it vegan? Piece of cakeüç∞

The extension comes with 6 popular edit options, and also allows you to create your own custom edits. You can easily make a dish spicier, healthier, or utilize your own ingredients to save some cashü§ë

Create your account at https://www.foodwiz.ai and enjoy 10 free recipe edits on us. When you're ready to upgrade, visit the pricing page (https://www.foodwiz.ai/pricing) and upgrade to our premium plan to access unlimited recipe edits.

Whether you're looking to improve your relationship with food and the kitchen, gain weight, lose weight, cook for the kids or a loved one, meal prep for the week or just try a new recipe, FoodWizü™Ñ has you covered. Sign up today, download the extension and experience the magic!
